name: Bubbles TD
description:
Like Tower Defense? Give our game a try.

The objective of the game is to install your weapons to prevent the bubbles travelling along the path from reaching the end. Use coins, earned by shooting bubbles, to buy new weapon and upgrade existing ones. Watch out against the BOSS bubble – it has multiple lives and shoots back at your weapons. Choose between different routes and different difficulty levels.

Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games...
